TopicTitle: Is there a way to edit Persistent to change when a Flag was set?

Articles.Content: Just out of curiosity, is there a way to change when a flag is set on the Mün?

You mean is it possible to edit a save file to change the date a flag was planted? Probably, poke around in the save file a bit. Try experimenting in a separate save file first so you know what you're doing.

Edited June 23, 2020 by Bej Kerman
